choices: I like the first idea  but want to change it
I like the second idea but want to change it
1.content:
Hi,
I had two ideas for the first verse but I don't like either.

1.
The Duck and the Mallard went walking one day,
When from their lake they hapened to stray

2.
David the duck
Said quack quack,
As he walked from the stream,
Water trickled down his back.
1.title: The first verse?

choices: Send the happy duck on a cute little adventure!
Blast the stupid bird to pieces!
Introduce the duck  to a cantankerous frog!
11.content:
There once was a duck with black and green feathers
He liked to go walking in all sorts of weathers
The rain made him grin and the snow made him quack
And the sun made him want to get tanned on his back!
And he sang:
Quacketty quacketty
quacketty quack
I'm a wonderful duck
and there's nought that I lack!
11.title: DUCK!!!!!!

choices: The boat people laugh at jim
111.content:
Now this duck called Jim,
Decided to go for a swim,
He found he could float,
And went to see a big boat,And he sang:
Quacketty quacketty
quacketty quack
I'm a wonderful duck
and there's nought that I lack!
111.title: The duck spots a boat

choices: Have Jimbo introduce himself to the duck
113.content:
Ole Jimbo the frog sat on a lily pad one day,
thinking of tricks that on victims he could play.
As he say there a thinkin his eyes spied a duck,
A stange little duck...
This was just his luck!
So Jimbo the frog slid right down in the water,
set out towards the duck,
smiled all the way,
for the fun he would have that fine day!
113.title: Jimbo the frog

1131.content:
As the small little duck floated around,
Watching red leaves hitting the ground,
He felt a small bump under his belly.
Looking beneath where the water was smelly,
He saw something green
That could barely be seen.
But he thought nothing of it,
And went on his way
(Only to be scared by it later that day).
1131.title: something green

12.content:
He waddled to
He waddled fro
He could not
Find a way to go
12.title: I like the second idea but want to change it

choices: Um...go away scary person.  Let me try something.
I like this idea.  Let me add to it!
13.content:
The Duck and the Mallard were walking one day,
And Mallard turned to Duck to say,
"Dear friend, I been thinking all day and all night,"
I wonder if you'd give me a little more insight,
For I've thought and I've thought and no answer has come,
To the why we must waddle whenever we run.
'Cause the cat and dogs do it better than we,"
Well Duck rubbed her chin and said, "Let's see..."
"The fact is we have two legs, and they have four."
"So they're able to run better, because they have more."
13.title: Duck and Mallard

132.content:
The duck and the mallard pondered all night,
When the question developed into a fight,
Feathers were bent and tempers flew,
And after all that neither of them knew
When all of a sudden along came a cat,
Can you imagine what they made of that?
They knew it was pointless to run,
So instead they had some fun,
They asked the cat a question
132.title: My thoughts

1321.content:
The cat of four feet, they asked him this
"Why do you run so?" and he said with a hiss
"I run to catch cat food like the two of you"
And duck and mallard took off and flew,
Over the lake, they went relieved.
The cat looking up hungry and deceived.
"That was close," said Mallard to duck.
"and was a studid thing to ask, you muck!"
"Well if you are happy with these webbed feet
then we shall part." said Duck from his heart.
1321.title: The Cat Episode

13212.content:
I am content to look for something better,
For you see these feet tend to get wetter,
Than the feet of the average creature,
And often our feet become our worst feature,
The thing is that there is little we can do,
If we aren't carefull we could end up in a zoo,
13212.title: The Mallard replied

14.content:
A Duck and A Mallard went walking one day
From their lake they happened to stray
Into fields and mountains they decided to cross.
Walked all day long and then they were lost.
14.title: verse 1 continued.

141.content:
All alone with each other,
They looked for another,
And met a...
141.title: Possible idea

1412.content:
a few pigs
From a barn

They couldn't get over
the pigs rolling in clover
and rooting up plants
in the yard

They thought it quite strange
that the pigs were deranged
1412.title: The barn

142.content:
"Well that was real smart,
why'd you lead us this way?"
asked the Mallard to Duck
who had knelt down to pray,
"Oh God help us find the way that we came, and we'll never go roaming, ever again"
142.title: Still just Tossin' Ideas Around

1421.content:
Divine intervention came from above,
The ducks were pleased,
As along came a dove,
Who flew around,
Above the ground,
And told them where to go
?????????????//


may be they don't get home first go
1421.title: idea

info.brief_description: An interactive poem by cel, zooduck and me.

This is a peom about a duck that we are trying to write together.
cel
zooduck
Goldie (104)
